agency_name: Virginia Conflict of Interest and Ethics Advisory Council
series_description: This series documents the receipt of conflict of interest statements for elected and appointed officials by the Secretary of the Commonwealth. This series may include, but is not limited to: original financial disclosure statements and statements of economic interests; requests for filing deadline extensions; and requests for travel waivers and accompanying documents that are related to travel expenses reported in statements of economic interests
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Virginia Conflict of Interest and Ethics Advisory Council
series_description: This series documents the registration of individuals as lobbyists to the General Assembly. This series may include, is not limited to: original registration forms and disclosure statements
